description:
Kyoko receives a vital piece of advice that the actor`s most important tool is to lack fear, as she fails the audition. In need of work, she takes up a part-time job working at a gas station.  But just as she starts working there, Sho appears! Fearing the worst, Kyoko hopes he won`t notice her...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 再会の迷宮(ラビリンス)
